scripts.tf:plan:dev: pnpm tf:select:dev || pnpm tf:new:dev && terraform -chdir=infra/terraform plan -var-file=dev.tfvars
scripts.db:reset:dev: pnpm tf:select:dev && pnpm tf:destroy:dev:db && pnpm tf:apply:dev && pnpm tf:output:d1
scripts.db:migrate:dev: pnpm --filter ./frontend exec wrangler --cwd ../deploy/cloudflare/dev d1 migrations apply DB --env production --remote
scripts.db:seed:dev: pnpm --filter ./frontend exec wrangler --cwd ../deploy/cloudflare/dev d1 execute DB --env production --remote --file ../../frontend/d1/seed/dev_seed.sql
scripts.db:init:dev: pnpm db:reset:dev && pnpm gen:wrangler:dev && pnpm db:migrate:dev && pnpm db:seed:dev
scripts.pages:deploy:dev:prod: pnpm --filter ./frontend build && pnpm --filter ./frontend exec wrangler --cwd ../deploy/cloudflare/dev pages deploy --project-name unitn-oj-dev --branch main
scripts.pages:deploy:dev:preview: pnpm --filter ./frontend build && pnpm --filter ./frontend exec wrangler --cwd ../deploy/cloudflare/dev pages deploy --project-name unitn-oj-dev --branch feature/demo
scripts.pages:deploy:prod:prod: pnpm --filter ./frontend build && pnpm --filter ./frontend exec wrangler --cwd ../deploy/cloudflare/prod pages deploy --project-name unitn-oj --branch main
scripts.pages:deploy:prod:preview: pnpm --filter ./frontend build && pnpm --filter ./frontend exec wrangler --cwd ../deploy/cloudflare/prod pages deploy --project-name unitn-oj --branch feature/demo
